articles.description: Wilshere was once tipped as a future England captain, but despite his quality as a midfielder and promising early progress, he struggled to shine at Arsenal after being hit by a number of injury problems.
articles.content:
Jack Wilshere has announced his retirement from football aged just 30 and is set to begin a coaching career by taking over Arsenal Under 18s.
Former England star Wilshere left Danish side Aarhus thi… [+13269 chars]
